data.name: Drifloon

attacks.name: Blowing Wind
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, put 1 of your Benched Pokémon and all cards attached to it on top of your deck. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Ominous Wind
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused and can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

data.flavorText: A Pokémon formed by the spirits of people and Pokémon. It loves damp, humid seasons.

data.name: Drifloon

attacks.name: Creepy Wind
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Wind Blast
attacks.text: This attack does 40 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

data.flavorText: These Pokémon are called the "Signpost for Wandering Spirits." Children holding them sometimes vanish.

data.name: Drifloon

attacks.name: Transfer Pain
attacks.text: Move 1 damage counter from 1 of your Pokémon to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

data.flavorText: These Pokémon are called the "Signpost for Wandering Spirits." Children holding them sometimes vanish.

data.name: Drifloon

attacks.name: Blowing Wind
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, put 1 of your Benched Pokémon and all cards attached to on top of your deck. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Ominous Wind
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused and can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

data.flavorText: A Pokémon formed by the spirits of people and Pokémon. It loves damp, humid seasons.

data.name: Drifloon

attacks.name: Minimize
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Drifloon by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Pull
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, switch the Defending Pokémon with 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

data.flavorText: It is whispered that any child who mistakes Drifloon for a balloon and holds on to it could wind up missing.

data.name: Drifloon

attacks.name: Sneaky Placement
attacks.text: Put 1 damage counter on 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

data.flavorText: Because of the way it floats aimlessly, an old folktale calls it a "Signpost for Wandering Spirits."

data.name: Drifloon
data.flavorText: Because of the way it floats aimlessly, an old folktale calls it a "Signpost for Wandering Spirits."

data.name: Drifloon

attacks.name: Creepy Wind
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

data.flavorText: If for some reason its body bursts, its soul spills out with a screaming sound.

data.name: Drifloon

attacks.name: Delivery
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, put any 1 card from your discard pile into your hand.

attacks.name: Reaction
attacks.text: Switch Drifloon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

data.flavorText: It tugs on the hands of children to steal them away. However, it gets pulled around instead.

data.name: Drifloon

attacks.name: Constrict
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Linear Attack
attacks.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 10 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

data.flavorText: A Pokémon formed by the spirits of people and Pokémon. It loves damp, humid seasons.

data.name: Drifloon
data.flavorText: Its round body is stuffed with souls and expands each time it leads someone away.

data.name: Drifloon

attacks.name: Mind Bend
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

data.flavorText: A Pokémon formed by the spirits of people and Pokémon. It loves damp, humid seasons.

data.name: Drifloon

attacks.name: Reckless Charge
attacks.text: Drifloon does 10 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Collect
attacks.text: Draw a card.

data.flavorText: Because of the way it floats aimlessly, an old folktale calls it a "Signpost for Wandering Spirits."

abilities.name: Unburden
abilities.text: If Drifloon has a Pokémon Tool card attached to it, Drifloon's Retreat Cost is ColorlessColorless more.

attacks.name: Big Explosion
attacks.text: Drifloon does 50 damage to itself.

data.name: Drifloon

attacks.name: Triple Spin
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage for each heads.

data.flavorText: Said to lure away young children and carry them off to the afterlife. Some whisper that Drifloon are formed of reincarnated human souls, but these rumors are as yet unconfirmed.

data.name: Drifloon

attacks.name: Balloon Blast
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage for each damage counter on this Pokémon.

data.flavorText: It is whispered that any child who mistakes Drifloon for a balloon and holds on to it could wind up missing.

data.name: Drifloon

attacks.name: Balloon Blast
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage for each damage counter on this Pokémon.

data.flavorText: It is whispered that any child who mistakes Drifloon for a balloon and holds on to it could wind up missing.

attacks.name: Expand
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes 10 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
